text: Madison Mari Gesiotto Gilbert (n√©e Gesiotto; born March 20, 1992) is an American attorney and politician. Gesiotto Gilbert won Miss Ohio USA 2014 and represented Ohio at that year's Miss USA. Gesiotto Gilbert was the Republican nominee for U.S. Representative in the 2022 election in Ohio's 13th congressional district. She lost the election in November 2022 to Emilia Sykes. ==Personal life== On February 22, 2021, Gesiotto married former NFL offensive tackle Marcus Gilbert.
